about_the_game:
LANDLOCK Project Wild is the ultimate bush-craft survival game in which you must survive the wild at any cost. The game is brutal, quite a challenge, but highly rewarding.

Travel across treacherous landscapes and battle heinous beasts that'll throw your warfare into overdrive. But don't you fret, for this is your playground—a forest wilderness—and terraforming is the brush in your hand. To your strategic advantage, shape the environment to create defenses and change the landscape to outmaneuver your predators.

Crafting is an art, and in LANDLOCK, it's the key to your survival. From its vast and diverse ecosystem, gather resources, then mix them in ingenious ways to create tools, weapons, and structures that will aid you in your quest for dominance.

In this hardcore survival adventure, your imagination knows no bounds. Or will it be towering fortresses that shield you from first-world hardships, or sneaking in the shadows, relying on cunning tactics to survive?

The only limitation would be your imagination in challenges to be overcome and in revealing the secrets of LANDLOCK. Do you have what it takes to thrive in desolate nature, where literally every decision could mean the difference between survival and absolute demise? Find this out in the ultimate indie pixel art survival experience!

P.S ~ You're not alone...

short_description: Embark on a hardcore survival journey in LANDLOCK, where creativity meets unforgiving challenges. Explore, build bases, fight enemies, terraform landscapes, craft strategically, and let your imagination run wild in this pioneering adventure! Are you ready for your ultimate test of survival?
